title: Accurate solution of the Index Tracking problem with a hybrid simulated annealing algorithm. (arXiv:2303.13282v1 [cond-mat.stat-mech])
abstract: An actively managed portfolio almost never beats the market in the long term. Thus, many investors often resort to passively managed portfolios whose aim is to follow a certain financial index. The task of building such passive portfolios aiming also to minimize the transaction costs is called Index Tracking (IT), where the goal is to track the index by holding only a small subset of assets in the index. As such, it is an NP-hard problem and becomes unfeasible to solve exactly for indices with more than 100 assets. In this work, we present a novel hybrid simulated annealing method that can efficiently solve the IT problem for large indices and is flexible enough to adapt to financially relevant constraints. By tracking the S&P-500 index between the years 2011 and 2018 we show that our algorithm is capable of finding optimal solutions in the in-sample period of past returns and can be tuned to provide optimal returns in the out-of-sample period of future returns. translated_title: 一种用混合模拟退火算法准确解决指数跟踪问题的方法
translated_abstract: 主动管理的投资组合往往长期内无法击败市场。因此，许多投资者通常转向被动管理的投资组合，旨在跟踪某个金融指数。建立这样的被动组合并最小化交易成本的任务称为指数跟踪（IT），其目标是通过仅持有指数中一小部分的资产来跟踪指数。由于是NP难问题，对于超过100个资产的指数来说，确切解法变得不可行。在本文中，我们提出了一种新型的混合模拟退火方法，可以高效地解决大型指数的IT问题，并且足够灵活以适应财务相关的约束条件。通过跟踪2011年至2018年之间的标准普尔500指数，我们展示了我们的算法能够在过去收益的样本期间中找到最优解，并且可以调整以在未来收益的样本期间中提供最优收益。最后，我们关注了IT问题中的稳定性，并展示了我们的算法能够克服收益非稳定性这一现象。
tldr: 本文提出了一种通过混合模拟退火算法高效解决指数跟踪问题的方法，该算法能够克服收益非稳定性的现象，适用于大型指数，并且具有灵活的财务相关约束条件。
en_tdlr: This paper presents a novel hybrid simulated annealing algorithm for efficient solutions to the Index Tracking problem, which is an NP-hard problem for large indices. The algorithm can adapt to financially relevant constraints and overcome the instability of returns. The proposed method is demonstrated on the S&P-500 index and provides optimal solutions in both in- and out-of-sample periods.
